about_history.title: Our History
about_history.subtitle: A tradition of educational excellence since 1997
about_history.heading: 28 years forming generations
about_history.text1: Founded in 1997, International Royal School has grown from a small local institution to become a benchmark in international education. Our mission has always been to provide quality education that prepares students for global challenges.
about_history.text2: Over the years, we have maintained our commitment to academic excellence, educational innovation, and the comprehensive development of each student.

about_mission.title: Mission and Vision
about_mission.subtitle: The pillars that guide our institution
about_mission.mission_text: To form global citizens through comprehensive excellence education, fostering critical thinking, creativity, and ethical values that allow our students to contribute positively to society.
about_mission.vision_text: To be recognized as the leading educational institution in pedagogical innovation and the formation of integral persons, capable of transforming the world with knowledge, sensitivity, and leadership.

about_values.title: Our Values
about_values.subtitle: The principles that define our educational community
about_values.excellence_text: We always seek the highest quality in everything we do.
about_values.respect_text: We value diversity and promote an inclusive environment.
about_values.innovation_text: We foster creativity and disruptive thinking.
about_values.social_text: Committed to the sustainable development of our community.
